question.body: The pH of a solution is a measure of the ________________ the solution.

response.feedback: Incorrect. The ionic strength is the total of all ions in a solution.
Incorrect. The molecular weight is a function of the specific molecules in the solution.
Correct. pH is a measure of H+ ions specifically.
Incorrect. Each atom has electrons. Even ionic species such as Na+ and Cl- do not impact pH, only H+.
